essay_data.topic_prompt: If you could visit any planet in the solar system, which planet would you want to visit?
essay_data.submit_text:
Do you know good at planet? I not good. But, I want to go a mar. If I could visit any planet, then I would visit mars.

First, mars can almost people leave on this planet. Because, here has a little water and people need things. And also mars is not long to go.

Second, Mar's is not hot and cold. So, the people can go and explore the Martian. But, I have car, head ack so I think go a mars is very hard to go for me.

In conclusion, I want to go a mar. Because, mars is almost good to live in here and temperatures are okay for people.

corrections.highlight: Do you know good at planet?
corrections.correction: Do you know a lot about planets?

corrections.highlight: I want to go a mar.
corrections.correction: I want to go to Mars.

grammar.feedback: Recurring errors with articles, prepositions, verb forms, and word choice make writing awkward; work on sentence structure.

corrections.highlight: Do you know good at planet? I not good.
corrections.correction: Do you know much about planets? I don't know much, but I'm curious about them.

corrections.highlight: If I could visit any planet, then I would visit mars.
corrections.correction: If I could visit any planet, I would choose Mars because it may support human life and has manageable temperatures.

introduction.feedback: Thesis is present but needs a clearer hook and a short roadmap of supporting reasons.

corrections.highlight: First, mars can almost people leave on this planet. Because, here has a little water and people need things. And also mars is not long to go.
corrections.correction: First, Mars might be habitable because it has some water and usable resources, and it is relatively accessible compared with more distant planets.

corrections.highlight: Second, Mar's is not hot and cold. So, the people can go and explore the Martian. But, I have car, head ack so I think go a mars is very hard to go for me.
corrections.correction: Second, Mars has milder temperatures than many planets, making exploration possible; however, personal health or travel limitations could make the journey difficult for me.

body.feedback: Basic ideas exist but clarity, evidence, and sentence structure need work for a logical, persuasive body.

corrections.highlight: I want to go a mar.
corrections.correction: I want to visit Mars.

corrections.highlight: Because, mars is almost good to live in here and temperatures are okay for people.
corrections.correction: Mars could be suitable for people because it has some water and reasonable temperatures.

conclusion.feedback: Conclusion restates desire but lacks synthesis and contains grammar errors; add a clearer summary and final thought.
